lead_paragraph: A picture caption on Saturday with an article about Armanti Edwards, the quarterback who led Appalachian State to an upset of Michigan to start the 2007 college football season and who is considered a Heisman Trophy candidate this season, misidentified the team he was shown playing against. It was Delaware, not Michigan.
